notes.title: Funding information
notes.p: The research was financially supported by the IMPRESSIONS project (funded by the European Unionâ€™s Seventh Framework Programme for research, technological development and demonstration under Grant Agreement Number 603416) and the Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council (BBSRC) grant no BB/N00485X/1 (as part of the MACSUR knowledge hub within the FACCE Joint Programming Initiative for Agriculture, Climate Change, and Food Security).
